question: 回転寿司
sourceMnemonic: You know that <ja>回転</ja> is "rotation" and you probably know what <ja>すし</ja> is (gets rendaku'd in this word to <ja>ずし</ja>). So, what is "rotation sushi?" It's <vocabulary>rotating sushi</vocabulary>, also known as <vocabulary>conveyor belt sushi</vocabulary>. Look it up if you don't know what it is.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading comes from <ja>回転</ja>, so be sure to know that to know this one. Also, it's just the readings of the kanji you learned too, so shouldn't be too hard.
